name: APOCALYPSE (itch) (Fox Miao)
description:
In APOCALYPSE, players need to control a big robot to fight.

Player one needs to use arrow keys or "WASD" to move, use a mouse to change the view, left-click to punch, and right-click to defend.

The other player needs to keep the balance by "Q" and "E"  and use "J" and "K" to get more oil.

If the robot loses balance, you die, if the monster destroy the robot, you die.

Good Luck to you.

Code by: FoxMiao, Ethan

Design by: FoxMiao, Ethan

Art: FoxMiao

This game is for ACCD Game FA22(48 hour)
